price: Na hakika wewe una tabia tukufu.
footnotes: Na hakika wewe bila ya shaka umeshikamana na sifa nzuri kabisa na vitendo vizuri kabisa alivyo kuumba navyo Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
